footer.description: Yaqeen is a non-profit initiative, designed by Egyptian hands to serve every patient and caregiver in Egypt. Our goal is to provide you with accurate information, reassure your heart, and save you many trips.
footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: All medical information on this site is for awareness and guidance purposes only and does not in any way replace consulting a specialist doctor and diagnosing the condition.
